title: Fiber-optic thin film chemical sensor of 2,4 dinitro-1-chlorobenzene and carbon quantum dots for the point-of-care detection of hydrazine in water samples
content:
Environ. Sci.: Water Res. Technol., 2024, Advance Article
DOI: 10.1039/D4EW00195H, Paper
Tanmay Vyas, Hritik Kumar, Gunjan Nagpure, Abhijeet Joshi
The development of DNCB-CQD thin film-based chemical sensors for the rapid and specific detection of hydrazine in various water resources.
To cite this article before page numbers are assigned, use the DOI form of citation above.
